title: The Grateful Dead Live at Rainbow Theater on 1981-03-21
source: SBD/AUD - Matrix SBD:MC > C > CD (speed corrected) & AUD:MC > C/1 > SB!Live > WaveLab > shn MC: Sony TC D5M, dolby B, TDK MA C90, Sennheiser 406T C/1: TDK SA-C90, Maxell XL II, dolby B, Nakamishi DR1 minor denoising and equalising (WaveLab) Frank Streeter's Sennheiser 421 mic > Sony D5 Audience source supplies the Intro as well as a patch in Drums
